name: Becoming Worse
description:
Everyone's always talking about becoming a better person and doing the right thing.

But when you're already in hell, does it really matter?

Time to focus on Becoming Worse. Challenge your friends and foes of the underworld as you try to figure out how to escape Limbo and dive deeper into the circles of hell. 

Are you persuasive enough to negotiate things? 

Or are you a force to be reckoned with? 

In Becoming Worse, it's up to you how bad you truly are!
